titleInfo.title: Thomas Moore in Bayou Robert, Louisiana to James Moore King in Murfreesboro, Tennessee

subject.topic: Slave trade -- Southern States History -- 19th century.

mods.note: This is a letter dated February 22, 1836 from Thomas Moore to his cousin James King. Moore asks King to keep him updated on the current prices of slaves in King`s area and of the prospects he has for his crops.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
